institution: Arab Academy for Science & Technology AAST
description: Developed a comprehensive smart home automation system for the graduation project, featuring IP wireless cameras for security and control. Designed integrated circuits to address various abnormal events, including smoke detection, fire detection, and temperature control.
achievements: Graduation project featured in Cairo ICT 2011
Project showcased in Egyptian Engineering Day 2011
Volunteer in IEEE - AAST Student Branch (Feb 2008 - June 2011)
Organized more than 30 IEEE events including Startup Weekend Alexandria, CarTronics, Life on a Chip

description: Completed secondary education with excellent academic performance.
